DataSource.Query: SELECT inventory.get_store_name_by_store_id(transaction_view.store_id) AS store_name, items.item_code, items.item_name, SUM(COALESCE(t.debit,0)) - SUM(COALESCE(t.credit, 0)) quantity, units.unit_name FROM inventory.transaction_view JOIN ( SELECT t.item_id, t.unit_id, CASE WHEN t.transaction_type = 'Dr' THEN t.quantity ELSE 0 END AS debit, CASE WHEN t.transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN t.quantity ELSE 0 END AS credit FROM inventory.transaction_view t WHERE t.value_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01'::date AND @Date::date ) t ON transaction_view.item_id = t.item_id AND transaction_view.unit_id = t.unit_id JOIN inventory.items ON transaction_view.item_id = items.item_id JOIN inventory.units ON transaction_view.unit_id = units.unit_id WHERE transaction_view.value_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01'::date AND @Date::date AND transaction_view.store_id = @StoreId::int GROUP BY transaction_view.store_id, items.item_code, items.item_name, units.unit_name;
